feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Budget control process for service activity in SAP Public cloud project system
entry.content:
Dear Team,

 

I have uploaded budget for G/L and WBS ,
Created service PR and PO , When we try to confirm services higher than budget amount , system is not blocking , we can able to confirm the services.
Please help me to fix this issue.
Regards
Ramesh

entry.title: RF Multi HU Picking
entry.content:
When I have a Warehouse Order to pick 3 HU, the RF is as follows

 

I want to scan the 1st HU and the destination bin and redo the process, but the system wants me to scan the 3 HU before scanning the destination bin.

 

 

 

 

How can I process to have the expected process (scan HU and destination bin for each HU) ?

entry.title: How to change the table define condition after the CDS view is published and used in an Query
entry.content:
Dear Community,

When we published a CDS view, and generated the cube, the analytic cube, and the view, we found there is a requirement to add table join condition fields between 2 data source.

However, since the view is published, system always generates the error message "

Data cannot be created since creation is disabled  /BOBF/FRW_COMMON/106".  

May I know it is possible to change the "Define join conditions" after the view is published?

Or we have to create a new CDS View? Thank you.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: I want to output an alerting message for changing the amount on a Purchase Order.
entry.content:
I want to ask about an alerting message for changing the amount on a Purchase Order.

What We did so far are below.

1.  We created a purchase order on a public cloud.

2. The po data is integrated to the business network.

3. We created an order confirmation and advanced ship notice orders.

4. We changed the amount on a po that we already created.

in this case, the amount of an item on s/4 HANA Cloud Public Edition and Business network is different because the change of amount is not integrated to the business network.

So, we want to show the message that means like " the amount of items on public cloud and business network are different".

Experts, would you tell me the way we output this message on a screen?

entry.title: Launching My Custom SAPUI5 App in S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
The Missing Link: Launching My Custom SAPUI5 App in S/4HANA Public Cloud
Hi everyone,

I've just built an RAP application using Eclipse ADT and then generated the SAPUI5 app from the service binding in VS Code. After successfully deploying it to my S/4HANA Public Cloud environment, I want to create a launchpad tile to access the app.

I created a custom tile using the URL generated from the deployment, but I'm stuck trying to associate it with a business catalog. When I try to add it, the system only allows me to select standard business catalogs, not my custom Z catalog.

Is this the right way to create a launchpad tile for a custom app in the public cloud? Has anyone else faced this problem and found a solution? Any help or advice would be greatly appreciated!

Kind Regards,

Marcelo Romeiro

entry.title: Issue with Creating External Number Ranges in S/4HANA Cloud Customizing System
entry.content:
Hello Community,

When maintaining number ranges for SD documents in S/4HANA Cloud, I was able to create external intervals such as G001–G999 in a Starter System.

However, when trying the same in a Customizing System, the system throws the error:

  • “Interval XX: Specify numeric interval limits” (Message No. NR560)

Has anyone experienced this difference? Why does it work in Starter but not in Customizing, and what is the correct way to achieve an external number range with a prefix like G in S/4HANA Cloud?

Thanks in advance!


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Inventory Count - Posting only possible in periods 2025/09 and 2025/08 in company code 0001
entry.content:
Hello there Sap, 

at 29.08 we counted our inventory. (Physically not in SAP)

Today (01.09.25) i want to post the Inventory differences in the SAP System for the Date 29.08 = Posting Date

When i do i get the error message: 

 

A difference can only be posted for period 09 2025

Diagnosis

The first count was posted for this physical inventory document in the period 09 2025. The differences must likewise be posted in this period.

 

When i create a new Inventory Document i also get this Message: 

 

Posting only possible in periods 2025/09 and 2025/08 in company code 0001

Diagnosis

The posting date entered is not within one of the permitted posting periods (current period/previous period).

This can be due to one of two reasons:

  • The correct current period has not been set in the system.
    For the system, the first of the entered periods is the current period. At the beginning of a new period, your systems administrator must change the current period in the material master record, using the function "Shift periods". This has not yet been done.
  • You have entered a wrong date in the field "Posting date".

    Procedure

    Check the posting date and correct it if necessary. If your input is correct, inform your systems administrator that the "period shifting" (period-end closing) process has not yet been completed.

    Message no. M7053

     

    Procedure

    Change the posting date so that the differences can be posted in posting period 09 2025.

    Message no. M7734

     Problem: Counting date is set to today at all times. I cannot influence that. 

    any ideas? 

    kind regards, 

    Philipp

entry.title: Why is Automatic Picking Not Triggered for Return Deliveries in S/4HANA Cloud?
entry.content:
We observed that automatic picking is not being triggered for return deliveries in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition. Even though the "Automatic Picking" checkbox is enabled for the shipping point, the picked quantity remains zero upon return delivery creation.

We've confirmed that:
- The return delivery type (e.g., LR2) is used.
- The item category (e.g., RENV) is relevant for picking.
- Shipping point config has "Automatic Picking" enabled.
- This is a non-WM scenario.
  
Is this standard system behavior, and if so, what is the recommended approach for streamlining picking in return deliveries?


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Public Cloud Edition Revaluation Order Maintenance
entry.content:
Dear community, I need your help with a question

In the Public Cloud Edition, in the current version (as of September 1, 2025), is the revaluation of maintenance orders with actual rates available?
In the On-Premise version, this functionality is performed using transaction KON2.
If the functionality exists, which App ID is used to execute it in Public?

entry.title: Actual cost rate calculation - cost centers (KSII) understanding
entry.content:
Dear All,

I have an issue that will drive me mad

I hope you can review my issue and either explain the reason behind it, provide a solution, or at least share an example of how the Actual Cost Rate Calculation works.

All of the following examples are based on the starter system of a client.

 

I am unable to understand the results of the Actual Cost Rate Calculation – Cost Centers (KSII) run. Below, I have detailed the setup and the results for your review:

 

  1. I created two activity types: Testl2 (Labor) and TestM2 (Machine).
  2. I verified that the Actual Price Indicator is set to 5 in their master data.
  3. In the Manage Cost Rate – Plan app, I defined a fixed rate for each activity type, assigned to cost center TEST_COST2 for period 008:

Cost Center

Activity Type

Fixed Rate

Per

TEST_COST2

Testl2

170

1 Hour

TEST_COST2

TestM2

100

1 Hour

 

  1. I confirmed activity types in two process orders with the following results:

Process Order ID

Activity Type

Confirmed Quantity

Allocation Cost Element

Total Cost

800006

Testl2

2 H

94311000 (Pers hrs)

340 EGP

800006

TestM2

2 H

94301000 (Machine hrs 1)

200 EGP

800007

Testl2

1 H

94311000 (Pers hrs)

170 EGP

800007

TestM2

2 H

94301000 (Machine hrs 1)

200 EGP

 

  1. Then In the Manage Global Hierarchies app, I opened YBGH_P00 (Activity Type Hierarchy [Predelivered]) and:
    • Assigned activity type TestM2 under node YBGHP4
    • Assigned activity type Testl2 under node YBGHP5
    • Saved and activated the structure

 

  1. In the Edit Cost Element Groups app:
    • For cost element group YBMF_P04, I added G/L account 63001000 Payroll Expense – Salaries
    • For cost element group YBMF_P05, I added G/L account 61100000 Payroll Expense – Salaries
  2. I then went to Check Configuration → Define Splitting Structure, and found the following (see screenshots below).

 

 

From the images, I understand that the cost elements that will post in the debit side to the cost center, which are included in cost element group YBMF_P04, will be used to recalculate the actual cost for the activity types included in activity type group YBMF_P04. The same applies for cost element group YBMF_P05 and activity type group YBMF_P05.

 

After that, I posted the primary cost elements included in the cost element groups I created earlier to cost center TEST_COST2, with the amounts shown in the table below:

G/L Account ID

G/L Account Description

Amounts

61100000

Payroll Expense - Salaries

900 EGP

63001000

Electricity and other Utilities

500 EGP

 

And that was the cost center booklet report before executing the Actual Cost Rate Calculation - Cost Centers (KSII).

 

Based on my expectations and my understanding of the assignments in the splitting structure, the system should recalculate the actual cost of the activity types as follows:

 

  • Actual cost of activity type TESTL2 = 900
  • Actual cost of activity type TESTM2 = 500

 

However, when I execute the Actual Cost Rate Calculation, I receive a result that I cannot understand. 

Notes Regarding the messages and warnings shown in the attachment is not related to the cost center and activity types in the case that I have explained

 

So kindly help me understand and solve this issue

 

Best regards,

Mostafa Mahmoud

entry.title: Can the Business Partner(A2X) Api support the extension of roles
entry.content:
你好，

 

请问我们有这样的场景，需要使用外部系统调用Business Partner(A2X) 该api去实现role的扩展和新增。

 

举个例子：如现有一个business partner：DIGITS，已有role：customer company和customer sales organization，需要扩充其供应商的role：supplier company和supplier purchase organization。

 

我们已经尝试使用了如下的操作，但是未达到实际需要的效果，且role也没有扩展成功。 

 

1.客户已存在，把现有客户扩展成供应商

 


2.先ADD ROLE使用API
   /API_BUSINESS_PARTNER/A_BusinessPartner('{ i_req-req-businesspartner-businesspartner }')/to_BusinessPartnerRole
  此步ADD ROLE报错

 


3.ADD 供应商公司使用API 
  |/API_BUSINESS_PARTNER/A_SupplierCompany| &&
                      |(Supplier='{ i_req-req-businesspartner-businesspartner }',CompanyCode='{ suppliercompany-companycode }')|
 此步报错 METHOD 不存在

 


4.ADD采购组织使用API
 |/API_BUSINESS_PARTNER/A_Supplier('{ i_req-req-businesspartner-businesspartner }')/to_SupplierPurchasingOrg|
  此步报错 METHOD 不存在

 

以上，想了解该api能否支持已有客户扩展供应商的步骤及已有供应商扩展客户的步骤，感谢！

 

Frank


--- Support Assistant ---
OData APIs

Q: Please specify the API and the operation you are using.
A: Business Partner (A2X)
Q: Which API entity are you trying to access? For example: Business Partner, Business Partner Relationship
A: Business Partner (A2X)


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Cost Component split in Professional Service Scenario J11 / J12 ?
entry.content:
In SAP Cloud we are pretty much following the standard professional service scenario for customer projects. Project are created, and direct activity type allocations are posted to record the services consumed and these projects are then billed out as time & material basis. 

In Margin analysis we now have the requirement to see the rate associated with the activity type posting, split in different cost components. For example, if we charge 10€ for a "password reset", then we want to see this in margin analysis split into 7,50 € employee related costs, 2,00 € Cost Technical Infrastructure and 0,50 € License cost. 

The documentation I found for cost component split in cloud seems only to discuss products which are calculated. Could above requirement be addressed in cloud?

Thanks in advance

Johannes

entry.title: S4hana collective production order sent partially to MES
entry.content:
hello

context : we externalize production orders to a MES partner

we use standard api Manufacturing Order – Send (Version 2) scenario SAP_COM_0522

We are having trouble with collective orders, it seems that when we release a production order parent, child is automatically released but only the child order is sent in the interface and the parent is never sent. also we dont have any information of a supposed relationship in the payload.

here is our collective order structure

and here is the payload received for production order 1000420 :

				<ResvnItmRequiredQtyInEntryUnit n2:unitCode="PCE" n2:SAPunitCode="ST">12.0</ResvnItmRequiredQtyInEntryUnit>

			<n2:MfgOrderNodeType>EndEvent</n2:MfgOrderNodeType>

		</ManufacturingOrderActivityNetworkElement>
		<ManufacturingOrderRelationship>
			<PredecessorMfgOrderNodeType>StartEvent</PredecessorMfgOrderNodeType>
			<PredecessorMfgOrderNodeID>000001000420SEVT</PredecessorMfgOrderNodeID>
			<SuccessorMfgOrderNodeType>Operation</SuccessorMfgOrderNodeType>
			<SuccessorMfgOrderNodeID>000000046100000001</SuccessorMfgOrderNodeID>
			<NetworkActivityRelationType>SucRel</NetworkActivityRelationType>
		</ManufacturingOrderRelationship>
		<ManufacturingOrderRelationship>
			<PredecessorMfgOrderNodeType>Operation</PredecessorMfgOrderNodeType>
			<PredecessorMfgOrderNodeID>000000046100000001</PredecessorMfgOrderNodeID>
			<SuccessorMfgOrderNodeType>Operation</SuccessorMfgOrderNodeType>
			<SuccessorMfgOrderNodeID>000000046100000002</SuccessorMfgOrderNodeID>
			<NetworkActivityRelationType>SucRel</NetworkActivityRelationType>
		</ManufacturingOrderRelationship>
		<ManufacturingOrderRelationship>
			<PredecessorMfgOrderNodeType>Operation</PredecessorMfgOrderNodeType>
			<PredecessorMfgOrderNodeID>000000046100000002</PredecessorMfgOrderNodeID>
			<SuccessorMfgOrderNodeType>EndEvent</SuccessorMfgOrderNodeType>
			<SuccessorMfgOrderNodeID>000001000420EEVT</SuccessorMfgOrderNodeID>
			<NetworkActivityRelationType>SucRel</NetworkActivityRelationType>
		</ManufacturingOrderRelationship>
	</ManufacturingOrder>
</n0:ManufacturingOrderExecuteRequest_V2>

or is it sent later depending on some other conditions?
are we missing something?
we don't have the relationship elements as expected in documentation 

https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_ON-PREMISE/a6f0333202384ba2b48a841a4a6deb1b/a05a3a43e7ad4b6c92c85d48dc88dc80.html?locale=en-US

thanks for help

entry.title: How to trigger emails for credit note approval requests
entry.content:
Hi

We are working on the credit note approval process.

Credit note type - CR 

The workflow is working fine.
But we have a requirement to send the mail to the approver while raising the credit notes.For this, we created a custom template by copying the standard one in the Maintain Email Templates app.

And we created a workflow in the Manage Sales Document Workflows app.

Please advise how to assign the sender, receiver mail IDs, and form template.

Thanks.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: ビジネスプロセスをデプロイする際に宛先を指定するのですが、宛先が全く表示されません
entry.content:
ビジネスプロセスにcreate sales orderのアクションを使用し、SAP S/4HANA CLOUD PUBLIC に受注伝票を登録しようとしております。このビジネスプロセスをデプロイしようとすると宛先を選択する画面が出てくるのですが、選択肢に何も出力されません。

BTPCOKPITのDESTINATIONS（宛先）にSAP S/4HANA CLOUD PUBLICにつながるHTTP宛先、saphelpに載っていたsap_process_automation_service、sap_process_automation_service_user_accessは追加しております。

どのように設定すればデプロイ時の宛先の選択肢に出てくるでしょうか
